name: WP GIF Uploader
author: GrandPlugins

sections.description:
The plugin handles the GIF upload process without losing the GIF animation in the uploaded gif and all generated subsizes.

Features

  • Upload the GIF to your wordpress without losing the animation in the GIF subsizes.

ðŸ‘‰ Pro | Docs ðŸ‘ˆ

If you want more options, in Pro Version offers applying all edit operations like [ croping, scaling, rotating, flipping ] on GIFs without losing the animation.
The plugin offers an option to create a GIF from images including other GIFs and also adding watermarks [ image watermarks – text watermarks ] to GIFs.
you can control the GIF play action in your posts to be autoplay or on hover or on click.

Pro Features

  • Create GIF from images.
  • Add image and text watermarks to gifs.
  • Control the GIF play action [ hover – click ].
  • Apply all the edits operations on gif in the media edit page without losing the animation [ crop – rotate – flip – scale ].
  • Optimize GIF loading by using first frame image at page load.
  • Regenerate animated-subsizes.

sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Start uploading GIF images from media and subsizes will keep the animation.
  4. GIF Editor settings is listed under Media Page.
